newsitem.title: USA: BLOOMBERG SAYS HAD NO CONTACT WITH REED.
newsitem.headline: BLOOMBERG SAYS HAD NO CONTACT WITH REED.

text.p: Michael Bloomberg, president and chief executive officer of Bloomberg LP, said he has had no contact with Reed-Elsevier Plc/NV about any merger talks and he is not interested in them.

Bloomberg, responding to a report in Saturday's Times of London, said the Anglo-Dutch publishing giant has evaluated Bloomberg Business News as a potential acquisition and a top Reed executive welcomed the opportunity for talks.

"I haven't had contact with them," Bloomberg said, except for his company using Reed's Lexis-Nexis service. Bloomberg mentioned the possibility of him acquiring Reed-Elsevier, but said it was not likely.
"If they stay out of my business, I'll stay out of theirs," Bloomberg said.
